_note: AUTO-GENERATED — do not edit directly. Edit stage-operator-dictionary.yaml and re-run: node --import tsx scripts/src/startup-loop/generate-stage-operator-views.ts

stages.outcome_operator: Clear problem statement with articulated pain, affected customer, and evidence of real demand.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-02 Solution-profiling scan.

stages.outcome_operator: Mapped solution space with at least three distinct options and comparative feasibility notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-03 Solution selection.

stages.outcome_operator: Selected solution option with rationale, key assumptions, and handoff brief for ASSESSMENT-09 intake.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-04 Naming handoff if a business name is still needed, otherwise proceed to ASSESSMENT-09 Intake.

stages.outcome_operator: Validated business or product name with brand-safety check and domain availability confirmed.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-06 Distribution profiling. If naming refinement is needed, run optional ASSESSMENT-05 Name selection first.

stages.outcome_operator: Naming generation spec with ICP, brand personality, competitive set, and 250 scored candidate names.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-06 Distribution profiling.

stages.outcome_operator: Distribution plan with ≥2 launch channels, cost/effort estimates, and ICP fit rationale.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-07 Measurement profiling.

stages.outcome_operator: Measurement plan with tracking method, ≥2 key metrics, success thresholds, and data collection feasibility confirmed.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-08 Current situation.

stages.outcome_operator: Current situation packet: launch surface, stock status, pricing model, channel pre-decisions, and open evidence gaps documented.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-09 Intake with all required precursors complete (ASSESSMENT-05 is optional).

stages.outcome_operator: Required ASSESSMENT precursors validated; intake packet produced/refreshed for downstream stages.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to ASSESSMENT-10 Brand profiling.

stages.outcome_operator: Assessment container complete. Proceeds to Measure entry only after completeness + quality gate passes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run /startup-loop advance to evaluate ASSESSMENT completeness + quality gate, then proceed to MEASURE-01 Agent-Setup.

stages.outcome_operator: Business name confirmed; personality adjective pairs, audience, voice & tone documented.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run /lp-do-assessment-11-brand-identity to create <YYYY-MM-DD>-brand-identity-dossier.user.md.

stages.outcome_operator: Visual language: colour palette, typography, imagery direction, token overrides. Brand identity artifact at Draft+.
stages.operator_next_prompt: ASSESSMENT complete. Run /startup-loop advance toward MEASURE-01 Agent-Setup. IDEAS runs as a standing pipeline on pack-diff or operator injection, not as a required sequential next step.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing pipeline state: pack diff scans reviewed, backlog updates applied, and promotion-ready ideas handed to DO fact-find when criteria are met.
stages.operator_next_prompt: IDEAS is standing (event-driven). Trigger IDEAS-01 when Layer A packs change or when operator injects a review request.

stages.outcome_operator: Automated diff scan completed; scan-proposals.md produced with CREATE/STRENGTHEN/WEAKEN/INVALIDATE/MERGE/SPLIT proposals.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Review scan-proposals.md and confirm applicability/quality. Route accepted proposals to IDEAS-02 Backlog update.

stages.outcome_operator: Semi-automated apply complete: accepted scan proposals reconciled into idea backlog/cards. MERGE/SPLIT changes confirmed by operator.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Apply accepted proposals to idea-backlog/user artifacts. Require explicit operator confirmation for MERGE/SPLIT before committing structural changes. Then proceed to IDEAS-03 Promote to DO.

stages.outcome_operator: Promotion decision complete: selected idea handed off to /lp-do-fact-find with traceable idea linkage.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run /lp-do-fact-find with the selected idea as input. Ensure fact-find.md includes idea linkage in frontmatter and the handoff criteria in handoff-to-fact-find.md are satisfied.

stages.outcome_operator: Current problem framing and ICP seeded from intake packet. Live document — updated directly when framing evolves or a pivot occurs. Consumers: MARKET-01 (always reads), SELL-01 (seed only), DO (build context).
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MEASURE-01 Agent-Setup.

stages.outcome_operator: Agent setup artifact captured for measurement/ops readiness with required integration details.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Confirm MEASURE-01 is Active, then proceed to MEASURE-02 Results.

stages.outcome_operator: Historical performance baseline captured as decision-grade context.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Two parallel streams start from MEASURE exit: (1) PRODUCT-01 Product from photo — Products stream starts now. (2) MARKET-01 Competitor mapping — Market intelligence stream also starts now, in parallel. Both streams converge at MARKET-06 Offer Design. Run PRODUCT-01 and MARKET-01 concurrently.

stages.outcome_operator: Product container complete: product-from-photo specification is captured, and adjacent product research is available when triggered.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run PRODUCT-01 Product from photo, then continue to PRODUCTS-01 Product line mapping (Products stream). MARKET-01 runs in parallel from MEASURE exit — it is NOT downstream of PRODUCT-01. PRODUCT-02 is optional after MARKET-06.

stages.outcome_operator: Manufacturing-ready product family spec from image evidence with controlled variation and uncertainty discipline.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to PRODUCTS-01 Product line mapping (next in Products stream). MARKET-01 is running concurrently in the Market intelligence stream — it is not the next step from PRODUCT-01.

stages.outcome_operator: Products container complete: standing product line intelligence is captured including SKU map, competitor scan, performance baseline, bundle hypotheses, PMF signals, roadmap snapshot, and aggregate pack.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run PRODUCTS-01 through PRODUCTS-07 in order. Aggregate pack (PRODUCTS-07) is optional at S4.

stages.outcome_operator: Current SKU inventory and positioning map documenting the full product line with differentiation notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to PRODUCTS-02 Competitor product scan. Cross-stream sync required: PRODUCTS-02 cannot start until MARKET-01 Competitor mapping (Market intelligence stream) is complete.

stages.outcome_operator: Adjacent SKU landscape with pricing benchmarks and competitive differentiation notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Cross-stream sync point: this stage required MARKET-01 Competitor mapping to be complete before starting. If business_profile includes post-launch, proceed to PRODUCTS-03 Product performance baseline. Otherwise skip to PRODUCTS-04 Bundle and packaging hypotheses.

stages.outcome_operator: Sell-through rates and margin by SKU, establishing a decision-grade performance baseline.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to PRODUCTS-04 Bundle and packaging hypotheses. Cross-stream sync required: PRODUCTS-04 cannot start until MARKET-03 Pricing benchmarks (Market intelligence stream) is complete.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing bundle options with pricing rationale and packaging format notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: If business_profile includes post-launch, proceed to PRODUCTS-05 Product-market fit signals. Otherwise skip to PRODUCTS-07 Aggregate product pack.

stages.outcome_operator: Compiled PMF signals: review sentiment, return rates, and demand indicators by SKU.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to PRODUCTS-06 Product roadmap snapshot.

stages.outcome_operator: Next 90-day product decisions with rationale, priorities, and open dependencies.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to PRODUCTS-07 Aggregate product pack.

stages.outcome_operator: Aggregate product pack combining line map, performance baseline, PMF signals, and roadmap snapshot into one standing artifact.
stages.operator_next_prompt: PRODUCTS container complete. Proceed to LOGISTICS (if applicable). Once LOGISTICS is complete (or skipped), both the Products stream and the Market intelligence stream converge at MARKET-06 Offer Design.

stages.outcome_operator: Logistics container complete: supplier mapping, lead time/MOQ baseline, fulfillment options, cost/margin by route, returns baseline, inventory policy, and aggregate pack are captured.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run LOGISTICS-01 through LOGISTICS-07 in order. Aggregate pack (LOGISTICS-07) is optional at S4. Skip entire container if business_profile does not include logistics-heavy or physical-product. LOGISTICS feeds MARKET-06 Offer Design (synthesis join), not MARKET-01.

stages.outcome_operator: Supplier list with MOQ and lead time data for each key supplier and manufacturer.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-02 Lead time and MOQ baseline.

stages.label_operator_long: LOGISTICS-02 — Lead time and MOQ baseline
stages.outcome_operator: Consolidated lead time and MOQ constraints per SKU with bottleneck flags.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-03 Fulfillment channel options.

stages.outcome_operator: Comparison of 3PL, self-fulfillment, and dropship options with cost and lead-time tradeoffs.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-04 Cost and margin by route.

stages.label_operator_long: LOGISTICS-04 — Cost and margin by route
stages.outcome_operator: Fulfillment cost stack per channel with contribution margin impact and route-level comparison.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-05 Returns and quality baseline.

stages.outcome_operator: Return rate by SKU and quality failure mode register with remediation notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-06 Inventory policy snapshot.

stages.outcome_operator: Inventory policy with reorder points, safety stock assumptions, and stockout risk notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to LOGISTICS-07 Aggregate logistics pack.

stages.outcome_operator: Aggregate logistics pack combining supplier mapping, cost/margin, returns baseline, and inventory policy into one standing artifact.
stages.operator_next_prompt: LOGISTICS container complete. Proceed to MARKET-06 Offer Design (synthesis join). LOGISTICS intelligence feeds the offer design stage directly.

stages.outcome_operator: Market container complete: competitor, demand, pricing, channel, and risk intelligence are consolidated into an offer contract.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Run MARKET-01 through MARKET-06 in order.

stages.outcome_operator: Competitor landscape map with direct/indirect alternatives, differentiators, and evidence references.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-02 Demand evidence once competitor mapping is complete.

stages.outcome_operator: Demand evidence pack with demand shape, audience pull indicators, and confidence tags.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-03 Pricing benchmarks.

stages.outcome_operator: Pricing benchmark ranges by competitor set, positioning tier, and confidence notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-04 Channel landscape.

stages.outcome_operator: Channel landscape with acquisition options, constraints, and channel-fit notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-05 Assumptions and risk register.

stages.outcome_operator: Consolidated assumptions and risk register covering open unknowns, conflicts, and required follow-up evidence.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-06 Offer design.

stages.outcome_operator: Offer artifact: target customer, positioning, pricing model, and messaging hierarchy.
stages.operator_next_prompt: SELL container fan-out begins: SELL-01 Channel strategy starts now. PRODUCT-02 is optional. MARKET-07..11 capture post-offer standing intelligence in parallel.

stages.outcome_operator: Offer contract integrated back into market intelligence with updated assumptions and conflict resolution notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-08 Demand evidence pack assembly.

stages.outcome_operator: Compiled demand evidence pack (DEP) from MARKET-01..07 signals into a single standing artifact.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-09 ICP refinement.

stages.outcome_operator: Narrowed ICP profile based on offer feedback and observed demand signals with confidence annotations.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-10 Market aggregate pack (draft).

stages.outcome_operator: Draft market-pack standing artifact assembled from intelligence stack.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to MARKET-11 Market aggregate pack (validated).

stages.outcome_operator: Validated market-pack: DEP and ICP refinement signed off. Standing artifact for downstream consumption.
stages.operator_next_prompt: MARKET container standing stages complete. Proceed to the SELL container fan-out: SELL-01 Channel strategy starts now.

stages.outcome_operator: Adjacent product research results: 5-10 candidate product types with feasibility flags and ICP fit scoring for product range expansion.
stages.operator_next_prompt: PRODUCT-02 (PRODUCT container) is non-blocking at S4. Share results artifact as optional baseline context for S4 merge.

stages.outcome_operator: Sell container strategy outputs are complete; standing sales intelligence captured; paid activation readiness is tracked separately.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Complete SELL-01 Channel strategy, then SELL-02..07 standing intelligence. SELL-08 is required before any paid spend.

stages.outcome_operator: Channel plan with 2-3 selected launch channels, 30-day GTM timeline, and SEO strategy.
stages.operator_next_prompt: SELL-01 must complete before S4 Baseline merge. SELL-08 remains required before paid spend.

operator_microsteps.label: Strategy design complete
operator_microsteps.description: Channel hypothesis and strategy design are complete. Requires MARKET-06 offer artifact. Allows channel plan artifact generation. Does not require measurement verification.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing baseline of active channel performance: conversion rates, CAC, and channel-level ROI by channel.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SELL-03 Outreach and content standing.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing record of outreach cadence, content calendar status, and engagement metrics.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SELL-04 SEO standing.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing SEO intelligence: organic rankings, keyword gaps, and backlink profile with priority actions.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SELL-05 Paid channel standing.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing paid channel performance: spend by channel, ROAS, and creative fatigue signals.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SELL-06 Partnership and referral standing.

stages.outcome_operator: Standing record of partnership pipeline, referral programmes, and affiliate activity with performance notes.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SELL-07 Sell aggregate pack.

stages.outcome_operator: Aggregate sell pack combining channel performance, outreach/content, SEO, paid channel, and partnership standing into one artifact.
stages.operator_next_prompt: SELL standing intelligence complete. SELL-08 required before any paid spend.

stages.outcome_operator: Paid-spend authorization state documented from measurement/risk/conversion checks.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Paid spend remains blocked until SELL-08 passes the activation gate.

operator_microsteps.label: Spend authorization
operator_microsteps.description: Spend activation gate. Requires decision-grade measurement signal verified (GATE-MEAS-01 pass). Blocks any live spend or channel activation until measurement thresholds are met.

stages.outcome_operator: Merged baseline snapshot and manifest commit combining offer, forecast, and channel artifacts.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Website stage can now proceed. Run WEBSITE-01 (pre-website) or WEBSITE-02 (website-live), then continue to DO.

stages.outcome_operator: Website workstream complete via one named process: WEBSITE-01 (L1 first build) or WEBSITE-02 (site-upgrade synthesis).
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to DO.

stages.outcome_operator: Framework-first assembly contract for the first website build, mapping canonical assets, boundaries, and implementation order.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to WEBSITE container completion, then DO.

stages.outcome_operator: Site upgrade brief with prioritized improvement backlog derived from competitor best-of analysis.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to WEBSITE container completion, then DO.

stages.outcome_operator: Feature or artifact delivered: fact-find brief, sequenced plan, and implementation with validation evidence.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to S9B QA gates before launch.

stages.outcome_operator: QA gate pass evidence: conversion flows, SEO readiness, performance budget, and legal compliance verified.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SIGNALS loop.

stages.outcome_operator: Weekly signals container complete: forecast refreshed, KPIs compiled, K/P/C/S decision made, signal quality reviewed, experiments read out and next cycle specs updated.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Repeat weekly. Run standing refresh prompts on monthly/quarterly cadence.

stages.outcome_operator: 90-day P10/P50/P90 revenue forecast with assumption register and sparse-evidence guardrails. Refreshed each cycle as signals accumulate.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SIGNALS-02 Measure.

stages.outcome_operator: Normalised KPI snapshot for the week: traffic, revenue, conversion rates, and denominator-valid metric set compiled from live analytics.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SIGNALS-03 Decide (KPCS decision).

stages.outcome_operator: K/P/C/S decision document: what to Keep, Pivot, Cut, and Scale this week, with rationale anchored to the KPI snapshot.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SIGNALS-04 Signal review in parallel with SIGNALS-05 Experiments.

stages.outcome_operator: Signal quality audit for this run: top findings ranked by Severity × Support, with process-improvement stubs for any structural signal weaknesses.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Proceed to SIGNALS-05 Experiments, then close the weekly cycle.

stages.outcome_operator: Experiment readout for active tests plus next-cycle backlog: new experiment specs added, completed experiments closed, carry-forward items noted.
stages.operator_next_prompt: Weekly cycle complete. Repeat from SIGNALS-01 next week.
